{{TPRGT Story
|character          = Kamisato Ayato
|date               = 2023-03-26
|zh                 = 
;今天是绫人的生日哦，我们快去为他庆祝吧！
:'''派蒙：'''哇——是七圣召唤卡牌！
:'''神里绫人：'''旅行者，要打两局吗？如果你赢了，我就把这套卡牌赠与你。
:'''派蒙：'''欸，明明是绫人过生日，反而是要送我们东西吗？
:'''神里绫人：'''不必在意，难得暂离公务，只是做些放松的事情。
:'''神里绫人：'''再说…结果还不一定呢，不是吗？
:'''派蒙：'''呃…旅行者，你一定可以的吧？
:'''旅行者：'''派蒙难得对食物以外的东西这么热衷…嗯，出牌吧~
|dialogue_review_zh = 「旅行者，要打两局吗？如果你赢了，我就把这套卡牌赠与你。」
|en                 =
;Today is [[Kamisato Ayato]]'s birthday, let's go and celebrate with him!
:'''Paimon:''' Whoa&mdash; It's a [[Genius Invokation TCG]] deck!
:'''Kamisato Ayato''' Would you like to play a few rounds, Traveler? I'll give you this deck of cards as a prize if you win.
:'''Paimon:''' Huh, isn't it ''your'' birthday, Ayato? Why are you giving us a gift instead?
:'''Kamisato Ayato''' Don't worry. It's always a special occasion when I get to put my official duties aside for a day, so we should just do something relaxing. 
:'''Kamisato Ayato''' Anyway... The victor is still yet to be decided, no?
:'''Paimon:''' Um... You can do it, right Traveler?
:'''Traveler:''' It's rare to see Paimon so passionate about something other than food... Sure, bring it on~
|dialogue_review_en = "Would you like to play a few rounds, Traveler? I'll give you this deck of cards as a prize if you win."
